name: Premium Resin Rock Climbing Holds for Kids & Adults, Large Training Rock Climbing Wall Grips Indoor/Outdoor, Rock-Like Texture Climbing Wall with Mounting Hardware
short_description: Package Includes - 30 PCS Nature-Inspired Climbing Holds,30 PCS Complete Mounting Hardware. Blending natural beauty with rock-solid durability, our climbing holds feature unique earthy details and a textured surface for an authentic outdoor climbing feel.

Quick Installation - We provide the complete mounting kit—including M10x40mm steel bolts (Pefect for 3/4" thick boards), T-nuts, split lock washers, flat washers, and an hex wrench—so you can move straight from unboxing to tailor-made climbing wall. No extra trips to the hardware store, just focus on your next climb

Material & Construction - Engineered for climbers of all ages , these oversized climbing holds are built to last. The rigid fiberglass core, combined with our weather-tolerant resin formulation, creates an exceptionally durable product. Each hold has been independently lab-verified to support weights exceeding 500 lbs, ensuring safety in high-traffic environments like professional gyms, climbing clubs, and active family homes

Sustainable Route Variety - Say goodbye to monotonous workouts. Our diverse shapes empower you to constantly redesign your climbing landscape, presenting fresh challenges that keep your body and mind engaged. This is more than a set of holds—it's a long-term solution to workout boredom, ensuring you're always eager for the next

For Every Hand, Every Plan - Boost your climbing versatility with a wide array of hold types, including jugs, pinches, slopers, and pockets, designed to target different muscle groups and to build a versatile climbing wall. Pro tip: Always secure your safety harness - it's your foundation for pushing limits with confidence

Qicrdvi Promise: Quality & Satisfaction - We guarantee a good climbing experience. If you are not satisfied, we offer a 48-hour refund or replacement. Worried about a missing screw? We utilize parts replacement service to get any lost or missing components directly to you, quickly and hassle-free
product_description: 30 Pcs Textured Holds Hand-finished in dreamy macaron hues with soft tactile textures—doubles as eye-catching wall art and practical climbing gear. Unique resin holds fuse sweet decorative charm with professional-grade climbing performance. All-In-One Kit + Universal Fit Includes 30 Pcs M10 bolts and T-nuts & washers,1 Pcs hex wrench. Fit for 3/4" thickness wooden walls, plywood or commercial structures for hassle-free setup. Create lasting family memories as your child builds confidence, balance, and motor skills. The soft, kid-friendly colors and ergonomic shapes make climbing fun and accessible, while the robust construction gives parents peace of mind. Jugs (endurance), Pinches (grip), Slopers (balance), Pockets (precision)—targets all muscle groups, adaptable to beginners & advanced users. Modular + Customizable Routes 30 interchangeable holds let you design endless routes. Redesign in minutes for fresh workouts, keeping kids entertained and training progressive.
